choice.CHOOSE_TEXT: We want to give you the best possible information. That is why we are asking you to make a choice from the following roles:

hirer.HERO_TEXT: So you are dreaming of a fully automated chain with your flex-suppliers? You want to be in a process without unnecessary supplier-lock-in? Join the collaborative flex experience
hirer.KIT_TEXT: After all the stories have become curious about FlexForceMonkey? Then ask for our connection kit. You can then connect your own system to ours and see what we can actually do for you.
hirer.INTRO_TITLE: If you hire flex workers you know what we mean
hirer.INTRO_TEXT: There are quite a few systems and processes in circulation and what is best for your organization often causes problems with your suppliers. How do you now link your optimization in purchasing, hours and HR systems to a smooth process at the supplier? You do not want to have any unnecessary costs if you do not want custom-made integrations!
hirer.CONNECT: Connect with your purchasing system or HR process
hirer.CONNECT_SUBTITLE: A menu of connection options always standardizes your optimization for integration.
hirer.CONNECT_TEXT: The most special thing about FlexForceMonkey is that we are not very demanding on your system. Whether you want to shop with us from a catalog buying process via punch-out, or want to offer a data feed as HR master data. Whether you want to participate with or without an hour registration system. We have a combinable solution for all common choices. And we connect your supplier (s) for you with the digital sauce they ask for. Easy online collaboration.

supplier.HERO_TEXT: Stop operational battles around PO numbers and hours that do not fit in the CLA: join the collaborative flex experience
supplier.KIT_INTRO: Online in no time: the FlexForceMonkey connection kit!
supplier.KIT_TEXT: Corporate integration software made just as simple as taking out an internet subscription? Yep, born in the cloud, naturally thinking in collaboration, that requires quick solutions. And that's what you get.
supplier.GET_KIT: REQUEST OUR KIT FOR FREE AND WITHOUT ANY OBLIGATIONS
supplier.INTRO_SUBTITLE: We have to find money, so if an invoice is correct we simply have to make sure it is made affordable.
supplier.INTRO_TEXT_1: We see high costs at many temporary employment agencies because invoices from customers in the process come to a standstill. This provides process costs to provide information that ensures that it is released, but this also generates huge interest costs because money is simply transferred too late.
supplier.AGENCY_SUBTITLE: FlexForceMonkey believes in an online market and thus makes collaboration possible for everyone.
supplier.AGENCY_TEXT: The FlexForceMonkey platform connects effortlessly to your processes via SETU messages, but you can also choose to work manually and manage resources and hours in our portal. In all cases we connect your customer (s) in the digital taste of their preference. Easy online collaboration.
supplier.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: REGISTER NOW FOR AN ONLINE ACCOUNT
supplier.PS: PS: did you know that working on our portal is just free for now ?!

freelancer.HERO_TEXT: You have ever become independent to create added value? Not to do administration! Join the collaborative flex experience
freelancer.INTRO_TITLE: Being busy with your dream is substantive work
freelancer.INTRO_SUBTITLE: So why would you waste your energy and time on chasing timesheets and invoices?
freelancer.INTRO_TEXT: FlexForceMonkey does not just offer software for time registration, we offer a platform that has arisen from cooperation between customer and supplier. So here you do not just make a timesheet, here control and communication of those hours with your customer directly in the standard solution.
freelancer.REGISTER_ACCOUNT: REGISTER NOW FOR AN ONLINE ACCOUNT
freelancer.TRY_SUBTITLE: Is your interest aroused? You can easily use FlexForceMonkey yourself!
freelancer.TRY_TEXT: We believe in the future of flexible work. We see it as the cement among our economic future. It is our dream that the entire flex industry will be online and connected. In this way not only everything becomes more efficient, we also think that this will benefit transparency and therefore honesty for all parties involved.
freelancer.TRY_NOW: JOIN NOW AND REGISTER YOUR ACCOUNT
freelancer.WORK_TITLE: Collaboration is the standard with us
freelancer.WORK_TEXT: So quickly create a company account, enter your flex resources and invite your customer (s) to review and receive online hours. For the time being, FlexForceMonkey is also completely free for use, now boarding you will definitely continue to benefit.

home.HERO_TEXT: One platform where the employment agency, hirer, freelancer and consulting company work together on an efficient process
home.HERO_PARAGRAPH: Scroll down to choose your role
home.HOME_INTRO: FlexForceMonkey is smart integration software that business partners in flex easier let work together. It allows for a seamless connection between administrations. To show how we can help you we would like to know what your role is in the chain. Click on one of the following choices to go to the relevant website.

cookie.BANNER_TEXT: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

contact-section.INTRO: Interest in FlexForceMonkey? Or do you have questions? Please fill in the following form and we will contact you as soon as possible.
contact-section.NAME: Name
contact-section.SUBJECT: Subject
contact-section.SEND_SUCCESS: Your form has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible!
contact-section.SEND_ERROR: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later!

database.LOG_IN_INTRO: Only an admin can see this page.

connect.FILL_IN: Leave your information to request the connection kit
connect.SEND_SUCCESS: Your request has been sent. You'll get the connection kit as soon as possible!
connect.SEND_ERROR: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later!
connect.NAME: Name
connect.EMAIL_GENERAL_COMMERCIAL: Email address may be used for general commercial information around FlexForceMonkey
connect.EMAIL_INDIVIDUAL_CONTACT: Email address may be used for focused individual commercial contact
connect.USE_CONTACT: We only use this data for the shipment of our connection kit and for follow-up for receipt.

newsletter.OPENS_NEW_TAB: Stay up to date? Register now for our newsletter!
